content:
Company Name - Nath Bio genes (I) Ltd (Veg.Division)
Position - Territory Manager
Location - Coimbatore territory Udumalai HQ covering Coimbatore,Erode,Salem & Dindigul.
Qualifications - B.Sc Agriculture/ Any degree.
Experience - 3-5 yrs in seeds division ( preferably for Veg.Crops)
If interested candidates pls. send your CV to ramani.r@nathseeds.com
title: Territory Manager
